description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/4476278463 at Wed Jun 14 21:55:23 UTC 2023

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: waf Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="waf"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="ops",environment="ops",monitor="global",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: waf Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.title: code_suggestions_host SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

WAF and rate limit rules for codesuggestions.gitlab.com host.



### Observability Tools

* [Cloudflare: codesuggestions.gitlab.com](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/gitlab.com/analytics/traffic?host=codesuggestions.gitlab.com&time-window=30)
* [Grafana: Code Suggestions Overview](/d/code_suggestions-main/code-suggestions-overview?)
panels.title: Details

panels.title: gitlab_net_zone SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of all GitLab.net (non-pulic) traffic passing through the WAF.

Errors on this SLI may indicate that the WAF has detected
malicious traffic and is blocking it.

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: gitlab_zone SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of all public traffic for GitLab.com passing through the WAF.

Errors on this SLI may indicate that the WAF has detected
malicious traffic and is blocking it. It may also indicate
serious upstream failures on GitLab.com.
panels.title: Details
